parameters.name: ApplicationConfigs
parameters.description: The application configurations. Number of elements in the array: 1 to 1000.

parameters.name: Applications
parameters.description: The list of services. Number of elements in the array: 1 to 100.

parameters.name: BootstrapScripts
parameters.description: The array of bootstrap scripts. Number of elements in the array: 1 to 10.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. The same ClientToken value for multiple calls to the RunCluster operation results in identical responses. Only one cluster can be created by using the same ClientToken value.

parameters.name: ClusterName
parameters.description: The cluster name. The name must be 1 to 128 characters in length. The name must start with a letter but cannot start with http:// or https://. The name can contain letters, digits, colons (:), underscores (\_), periods (.), and hyphens (-).

parameters.name: ClusterType
parameters.description:
The type of the cluster. Valid values:

*   DATALAKE
*   OLAP
*   DATAFLOW
*   DATASERVING
*   CUSTOM
*   HADOOP: We recommend that you set this parameter to DATALAKE rather than HADOOP.

If the first time you create an EMR cluster is after 17:00 (UTC+8) on December 19, 2022, you cannot create a Hadoop, Data Science, Presto, or ZooKeeper cluster.

parameters.name: DeletionProtection
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable release protection for the cluster. Valid values:

*   true: enables release protection for the cluster.
*   false: disables release protection for the cluster.

Default value: false.

parameters.name: DeployMode
parameters.description:
The deployment mode of master nodes in the cluster. Valid values:

*   NORMAL: regular mode. This is the default value. A cluster that contains only one master node is created.
*   HA: high availability mode. A cluster that contains at least three master nodes is created.

parameters.name: NodeAttributes
parameters.description: The node attributes. The basic attributes of all ECS nodes in the cluster.

parameters.name: NodeGroups
parameters.description: The array of configurations of the node groups. Number of elements in the array: 1 to 100.

parameters.name: PaymentType
parameters.description:
The billing method of the cluster. Valid values:

*   PayAsYouGo
*   Subscription

Default value: PayAsYouGo.

parameters.name: ReleaseVersion
parameters.description: The EMR version. You can query available EMR versions in the EMR console.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: SecurityMode
parameters.description:
The security mode of the cluster. Valid values:

*   NORMAL: regular mode. Kerberos authentication is disabled. This is the default value.
*   KERBEROS: Kerberos mode. Kerberos authentication is enabled.

parameters.name: SubscriptionConfig
parameters.description: The subscription configurations. This parameter is required when the PaymentType parameter is set to Subscription.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tag. Number of elements in the array: 0 to 20.
